message: This offer is based on the current value of the money, considering the inflation rates. I propose we split it 70/30 in your favor.
I think we can both do better than a 70/30 split.  Let's start with a more even 80/20 split in my favor.  This takes into account the coming inflation and should make it a good deal for both of us.
Considering the inflation rates and the previous offers, I propose a split of 45/55. This aims to balance the value of the money for both of us while accounting for its decreasing worth over time.
